title: Битва роботов
overview: This project demonstrates exciting battles of robots controlled by teams of engineers and young specialists from different parts of our country.The online show shows how Russian robotics is developing and entering the international arena. You will see not only robots, but also real stories of people behind their creation. With each battle, the tension will grow, and in the final, we will find out which team will be the best in this season of the online show.Each episode will show not only intense battles, but also the behind-the-scenes work of the teams, their victories and failures, technical discoveries and unexpected problems. You will see what tactics the participants choose, how they adapt to their opponents and what decisions they make in critical situations.
